title: FO-06: Foundation & Navigation
description:
Set up FO-06 directory structure and navigation

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-26-fo-06/2026-01-26-fo-06-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `app/fo-05/` - Reference implementation to base structure on
- `lib/nav.config.ts` - Navigation configuration
- `app/overview/page.tsx` - Overview page to update
notes:
2026-01-26 11:04 - FO-06 directory structure follows FO-05 pattern exactly. Layout client gracefully handles missing nav.config entry (returns empty array). Navigation entry for FO-06 in nav.config.ts should be added in a separate task.
2026-01-26 11:06 - l6q: Added FO-06 to navigation and overview. Pattern: nav.config.ts needs label/href/children array with Demo+Info, overview page needs both a version card AND a table row. FO-05 table row was missing border-b class - fixed that while adding FO-06.
closed_reason: Foundation complete: FO-06 directory structure created with page, layout, client layout, info page, and components folder. Navigation and overview page updated.
